metadata.title: Week 1 Day 3: Introduction to Latin Nouns

prior_knowledge_digest: Students should be familiar with the basic structure of Latin sentences, including the subject-verb-object order. They have been introduced to the concept of Latin being an inflected language, where the endings of words change to indicate their role in the sentence. Familiarity with the first conjugation of verbs and basic vocabulary related to greetings and simple actions is also expected.
yesterday_recap: Yesterday, we explored the concept of Latin verbs and their conjugations, focusing on the first conjugation. Students practiced forming simple sentences using these verbs.
misconception_watchlist: Confusing noun endings with verb endings
Misidentifying the subject in a sentence

primary: Introduce the concept of Latin nouns
Understand the role of noun endings in indicating case

lesson_flow.description: Review the basic sentence structure and first conjugation verbs.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students recall and share examples of sentences using first conjugation verbs.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Encourage students to think of sentences they used in previous lessons.

lesson_flow.description: Introduce Latin nouns and the concept of declensions.
lesson_flow.student_action: Listen and take notes on the introduction of nouns and declensions.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Use examples to illustrate how noun endings change.

lesson_flow.description: Practice identifying nouns and their roles in sentences.
lesson_flow.student_action: Work in pairs to identify nouns in example sentences and discuss their roles.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Provide immediate feedback and clarify any misconceptions.

lesson_flow.description: Students complete a worksheet on identifying and using Latin nouns.
lesson_flow.student_action: Independently complete the worksheet, focusing on noun endings.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Circulate to offer help and check for understanding.

lesson_flow.description: Summarize the day's learning and preview the next lesson.
lesson_flow.student_action: Share one new thing learned about Latin nouns.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Encourage students to reflect on how noun endings affect meaning.
